title: Our History
desc: Charot, a family-owned manufacturing and trading company founded in 2016, evolved from Addis Ababa’s wholesale trade into manufacturing and real estate, meeting construction demands with innovation and sustainability.

title: Our Mission
desc: As pioneers of eco-friendly door manufacturing in Ethiopia, we provide sustainable, innovative solutions that enhance both functionality and aesthetics while contributing to a greener planet.

title: Our Vision
desc: Our vision is to lead Africa in innovative, sustainable door solutions, driving a shift toward eco-friendly construction where every building reflects a commitment to sustainability, functionality, and aesthetics.

title: Our Core Values
desc: Sustainability – Committed to eco-friendly, responsible manufacturing. Customer-Centricity – Delivering quality, reliability, and exceptional service. Integrity – Upholding transparency, ethics, and trust in all we do.
